ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature , 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix, 3 cups cold skim milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed,   +   1/2 (12 ounce) package vanilla wafers, 4  bananas, sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 20%, Saturated Fat 10g 49%, Cholesterol 33mg 11%, Sodium 334mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 55g 20%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 37g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 4mg 22%, Calcium 191mg 15%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 397mg 8%
